text.sentence: Sooz, I called SW Bell and changed the number.
Apparently, I can't have that number in my new place, but in order for a changed number message to run, you can't have it either.
So the new number on your second line is (713) 426-5773 and it will start on the 5th.
Until then, my number will ring in both places.
My new number is (713) 526-7855... Hope this is okay with you.
I left the new second number tied in with the 4960 number with the same long distance service you have on that line etc.
Hope you are having a good morning!
